members.name: version
members.description: Returns the current version of the game.

members.name: isHost
members.description: Returns whether the game is running on the host.

members.name: isServerHost
members.description: Returns whether the script is running in server mode.

members.name: exists
members.description: Returns whether an object exists in the game.

members.name: dofile
members.description: Opens the named file and executes its contents as a chunk.

members.name: type
members.description: Returns the type of an object as a string.
